name: Eid Cookies
description: Celebrate the joyous occasion of Eid with our delightful Eid cookies. These tender treats are super buttery , dusted with powdered sugar, with a delicious surprise in the middle.
recipe:
1.Mix flour, salt, sugar, baking powder and pistachio nuts
2.Add ghee into the mixture and stir well until a consistent shape is formed
3.Combine flour, baking powder,salt and cook the flour until golden brown
4.Insert the mixture from step 1 into the dough and roll the dough into balls
5.Bake at 350Â°F for 8-10 minutes or until edges are golden brown
6.Spread powdered sugar across the baked cookies

name: Vanilla Cookies
description: Enjoy the simple pleasures of our Vanilla Cookies. These buttery cookies are made with pure vanilla extract and are perfect for any occasion.
recipe:
1.Mix butter, sugar, and vanilla and whisk until fluffy
2.Add egg, and mix until just combined
3.Scoop, roll, and coat dough in granulated sugar
4.Bake until edges are set and slightly golden
5.Reshape with a round cookie cutter,6.Cool on wire racks
